statements: SELECT * FROM food_journal WHERE calories > 500 ORDER BY meal_date DESC, meal_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT meal_id, meal_name, calories FROM food_journal WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_description FROM food_journal WHERE meal_date = '2022-03-15' AND meal_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM food_journal WHERE user_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND meal_description LIKE '%vegetarian%';
SELECT meal_name, calories FROM food_journal WHERE meal_date >= '2022-04-01' AND meal_date <= '2022-04-30' ORDER BY calories ASC, meal_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT meal_name, calories FROM food_journal WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM food_journal WHERE meal_date = '2021-10-15' AND calories < 500;
SELECT meal_name, meal_date, calories FROM food_journal ORDER BY calories DESC, meal_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT meal_name FROM food_journal WHERE meal_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT AVG(calories) AS avg_calories FROM food_journal GROUP BY meal_date HAVING avg(calories) > 600;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT meal_name, calories FROM meals WHERE meal_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM meals ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(calories) AS total_calories FROM meals GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_calories > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM meals ORDER BY meal_date DESC, calories ASC;
SELECT user_id, meal_name, calories FROM meals WHERE calories > 500 ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT users.username, meals.meal_name, meals.meal_date FROM users JOIN meals ON users.user_id = meals.user_id WHERE users.username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT meal_name, meal_date FROM meals WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY meal_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, meal_name, rating FROM meal_logs WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN meals ON users.id = meals.user_id WHERE users.id = 3
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM meals WHERE meal_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT meal_name, meal_description FROM meals JOIN users ON meals.user_id = users.id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT meal_name, meal_description, log_date FROM meals JOIN meal_logs ON meals.meal_id = meal_logs.meal_id WHERE meal_logs.user_id = 2 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_description, rating, comment FROM meals JOIN meal_logs ON meals.meal_id = meal_logs.meal_id WHERE meals.user_id = 3 AND meal_logs.rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT meal_name, calories FROM meals WHERE calories > 500 ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_date, meal_time FROM meals WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND calories IS NULL;
SELECT category_name FROM meal_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM meals ORDER BY calories DESC, meal_date ASC;
SELECT meal_name, meal_date FROM meals WHERE user_id = '1f107d57-896c-4cb3-b045-958c03cf1552' AND calories > 500;
SELECT meal_name, log_date FROM meals JOIN meal_logs ON meals.meal_id = meal_logs.meal_id WHERE meal_logs.category_id = 'c5e9ce2a-fdbd-4d10-8934-43e56e0eaf4c';

SELECT users.username, meal_name FROM users JOIN meals ON users.user_id = meals.user_id WHERE meals.calories < 300 AND users.email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY users.username ASC, meals.calories DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT meal_name, calories FROM meals WHERE calories > 500;
SELECT item_name, calories_per_serving FROM food_items ORDER BY calories_per_serving DESC;
SELECT * FROM meal_items WHERE serving_size < 3;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM trends WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT meal_name, calories FROM meals WHERE calories > 500 ORDER BY meal_time DESC;

SELECT users.username, meals.meal_name, food_items.item_name FROM users JOIN meals ON users.user_id = meals.user_id JOIN meal_items ON meals.meal_id = meal_items.meal_id JOIN food_items ON meal_items.item_id = food_items.item_id WHERE users.username = 'John' ORDER BY meals.meal_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trends.trend_description, users.username FROM trends JOIN users ON trends.user_id = users.user_id WHERE trends.trend_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY users.username ASC;
SELECT meal_name, SUM(calories) AS total_calories FROM meals GROUP BY meal_name HAVING total_calories > 1000 ORDER BY total_calories DESC;
